title: Colombiaâ€™s President, an Outspoken Trump Critic, Heads to the White House
summary_full: Gustavo Petro of Colombia and President Trump have had a tense relationship that escalated into threats by Mr. Trump, before easing. Anything could happen at their Feb. 3 meeting.
